mita awurudu kihipayakata kalin enam 2004 awurudde ape shabdakoshayata aluth wachanayak ekkala 2004 desambar 26 weni dina enam heta wani dinaka apita amihiri mathaka pamanak ithirikala sunami udam rala ha sambhanda athuru kathawaki. 2004 warshayen pasu podi kollo kuruttage sita mahalla dakwama dannawa sunamiya yanu kumakda kiya. 2004.12.26 dina sunamiyen pasu mita awurudu kihipayakata kalin mulu ratama sinhala aluth awuruddakata laka lasthiwemin sitiye.
